attributes.action: Reconsider the decision to cut aid to Yemen
attributes.additional_details: The government has taken the decision to cut aid to Yemen to free up money for the domestic response to Covid. As one of the richest countries in the world this is an abdication of our responsibility to the poorest in the world
attributes.background: To reverse the decision to cut the aid amount to the Yemen.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577527
